name: Yanomo
tag_list: timetracking, social, productivity, calendar, app, saas
overview:
Yanomo offers social time tracking as Software-as-a-Service. Based in Amsterdam, we have quickly grown to a team of 8 people serving hundreds of clients across the globe.

We believe in servicing people, not systems. If you’re running a service business, be good to people. They are your capital. Let them spend their time wisely. Let them work where they want to. Let them use a time tracking solution that doesn’t add an extra layer of complexity, but blends into their workday without force.
